title: 为什么做完的武器包不仅显示不了3D皮肤 而且没声音
author: ED_YUGE
txt_content:
求解

这是 枪械的配置 KA47 文件名 AK47G
Name §e黄金Ak47
ShortName ak47G
//The ammo this gun uses (shortName)
Ammo ak47AmmoG
Icon AK47G
//Colour in Red, Green, Blue, each going up to 255.
Colour 255 255 255
ItemID 33813
//Reload time in ticks, 1/20ths of a second
ReloadTime 40
//The amount of gun recoil, all relative : Sten = 1, Mp40 = 3, Kar98kSniper = 20
Recoil 2
//Damage in half hearts
Damage 7
//The higher this value, the more the bullets spread
Accuracy 5
//Time in ticks between rounds
ShootDelay 2
ShootSound AK47ShootG
ReloadSound MP44ReloadG
Mode FullAuto
//Bullet speed, default 3.0
BulletSpeed 10.0
//Default scope settings. Usually for aiming down sights. In which case, use FOVZoomLevel, not ZoomLevel
Scope None
ZoomLevel 1.0
FOVZoomLevel 1.25
//Deployable Settings
Deployable False
DeployedModel None
//Model settings
Model mw.AK47G
Texture AK47G
//Attachment Settings
AllowAllAttachments false
//List here all the attachments allowed on this gun by shortName and separated by spaces
AllowAttachments flanMWSilencer flanMWRedDot flanMWACOG flanMW4xScope flanMWSingleFire flanMWBurstFire flanMWAutoFire
AllowBarrelAttachments true
AllowScopeAttachments true
AllowStockAttachments false
AllowGripAttachments false
NumGenericAttachmentSlots 1

弹夹的配置 文件名 AK47AmmoG
Name §f普通弹 §7剩余§e§l
ShortName ak47AmmoG
Model Bullet
//Colour of icon and model
Colour 255 255 255
ItemID 33812
Icon AK47AmmoG
//How affected by gravity the bullet is
FallSpeed 0.25
//The maximum stack size
MaxStackSize 4
//The number of rounds each item has. Limited to 32000.
RoundsPerItem 35
//The damage multiplier caused by the bullet on hitting an entity
Damage 1
//Size of explosion caused
Explosion 0
//True if bullet explodes on hitting anything. Fuse denotes the maximum time it may spend in the air before detonating
ExplodeOnImpact False
Fuse 0
FlakParticles 0
//Amount of fire to spread on exploding; for each increment, it will increase the dimensions of the burning area by 2. i.e. 1 will burn a 3x3 square, 2 will burn a 5x5 square
Fire 0
BreaksGlass True
//Size of box to check for entities to hit / detonate
HitBoxSize 0.1
HitSound bullet
//Whether or not the bullet can travel through an entity having hit it
Penetrates True
SmokeTrail False

这些是图片

下载附件

2016-6-19 12:23 上传






声音文件上传不了 反正从原有的现代武器包提取过来的

帮我看看出了什么问题

replies.author: 竹取Zhu_qu
replies.txt_content:
您好！3D武器模型并不是在这里设置的。
您打开com文件夹，一直翻到最后，会有一些class文件，
这些文件才是武器的3D模型，而您的这个是在guns里面的
配置武器的属性文件。
